meta.job_title: Supply Chain MBA Development Rotational Program

duties_responsibilities.duty: Forecasts and communicates engineering, materials, and manufacturing requirements to suppliers.
Coordinates product development process deliverables through matrix management of buyers, planners, and production control.
Assists in supplier price and delivery negotiations.
Works with engineering to identify preliminary critical parts, long-lead parts and inspection requirements.
Actively mediates and partners with quality and engineering teams to resolve supplier quality issues for assigned product groups.

education_certification.credential: MBA in Supply Chain Management (preferably with a technical undergraduate degree)
Certifications in Six Sigma Green Belt, APICS CPIM, APICS CSCP, PMP (preferred)
